inputs.remark:
缺少V2 （影像学检查）和V3 （手术）
V1 pure tone audiometry 注明气骨导无差距
CT的interthecal改为intrathecal

logic_summary: Updated V1 Pure-tone audiometry key_findings to explicitly note 'No air-bone gap'.
Removed CT Scan from V1 to move it to a dedicated Imaging encounter.
Created V2 (Radiology) containing the CT Scan, correcting 'interthecal' to 'intrathecal'.
Created V3 (Surgery) containing the surgical findings regarding the tumor extent and removal.

patch_ops.value: Right ear shows moderate to severe sensorineural hearing loss. Left ear shows mild to severe sensorineural loss commencing at 2000 Hz. No air-bone gap.

history.present_illness: Follow-up imaging for suspected retrocochlear pathology.

tests.name: CT Scan
tests.key_findings: CT of right petrous pyramid with intrathecal air injection. Air did not fill the Internal Auditory Meatus (IAM), indicating a mass. Axial cut showed mass extending into the Cerebellopontine Angle (CPA).

tests.name: Surgical Findings
tests.key_findings: Tumor filled most of the IAM and extended approximately 1.5 cm into the CPA. The tumor was removed successfully.
